author: Simon Difford
description: A practically tropical, rum laced, fruity number.
name: Honolulu Juicer
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
45 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
